Public Class XamlMember Implements IEquatable(Of XamlMember)

summary.span: 为 XAML 类型的成员提供 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: Provides the XAML type system identifier for members of XAML types.

summary.span: 该标识符由 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器在处理成员节点的过程中使用（如果 XAML 读取器位于 上），另外还用于常规 XAML 类型系统逻辑。

span.span: The identifier is used by XAML readers and XAML writers during processing of member nodes (when the XAML reader is positioned on a ) and also for general XAML type system logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用三种方法来返回有关 XAML 成员的信息: 标准公共语言运行时 (CLR) 反射;调用使用经过优化的位标志的内部 Api 的仅引用反射技术;或调入可能`Lookup*` 子类提供的 API 的虚拟覆盖。 can use three methodologies for returning information about a XAML member: standard common language runtime (CLR) reflection; a reference-only reflection technique calling internal APIs that use optimized bit flags; or calling into virtual overrides of the `Lookup*` API that is provided by possible subclasses. 若要在大多数情况下使用 .NET Framework xaml 服务 api 和 API, 请使用默认的 xaml 架构上下文。For most uses of .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the API, you use the default XAML schema context. .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文将 CLR 支持用于类型系统。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services uses CLR backing for the type system. 这使得 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器可以使用在中定义的任何类型或成员, 也可用于 CLR 及其反射技术。This enables the XAML readers and XAML writers to work with any type or member that is defined in, or otherwise available to, the CLR and its reflection techniques. ## Lookup \* Api 和 XamlMember 派生类Lookup\* APIs and XamlMember Derived Classes 定义派生类可能重写的若干虚拟成员。 defines several virtual members that derived classes might override. 这些成员具有始终以字符串`Lookup`开头的名称。These members have names that always start with the string `Lookup`. 然后, API 名称的其余部分引用该虚拟方法所影响的属性。The remainder of the API name then references the property that the virtual method influences. 例如, 派生类可以重写 , 以影响基定义属性在派生类中返回的内容。For example, a derived class might override to influence what the base-defined property returns in a derived class. 通过阅读相关`Lookup*`方法的文档, 可以预测或现有派生类中的此类属性的返回值。You can predict return values for such properties in or existing derived classes by reading the documentation for the relevant `Lookup*` methods. `Lookup*`方法的用途是提供一个包含基类的 XAML 类型系统扩展技术。The purpose of the `Lookup*` methods is to provide a XAML type system extension technique that incorporates the base class. 通过从和`Lookup`重写虚拟成员, 您可以为 xaml 类型系统中的 xaml 架构定义 xaml 成员的概念, 而不会绑定到后备类型系统或技术的具体内容。By deriving from and overriding the `Lookup` virtual members, you can define the concept of a XAML member for a XAML schema in a XAML type system without being tied to the specifics of a backing type system or technology. 您还可以在此方案下使用提供的 XAML 架构上下文, 并且仍返回所需的结果。You can also use a provided XAML schema context under this scheme and still return the results you want. 例如, 请考虑属性。 As an example, consider the property . 此属性通知调用方, 如使用进行序列化等操作可以为目标对象上的此成员写入值。This property informs callers that operations such as using a for serialization can write a value for this member on a target object. 在默认实现中, 确定成员是否可写是通过对后备 CLR 及其成员() 使用反射技术来进行的。In the default implementation, the determination of whether the member is writable is made by using reflection techniques against the backing CLR and its members (the ). 因此, 默认情况下, XAML 类型系统依赖于 CLR 类型系统。Therefore, by default, the XAML type system depends on the CLR type system. 但是, 你可以通过重写 API 来删除 XAML 类型系统报告的依赖关系。However, you can remove this dependency for your XAML type system reporting of by overriding the API . 在重写中, 你可以使用其他确定, 例如特定于你的技术的元数据、针对固定 XAML 词汇进行了优化的主查找表或用于确定 XAML 成员是否可在你的XAML 词汇。Within your override, you can use other determinations, such as metadata that is specific to your technology, a master lookup table that is optimized for a fixed XAML vocabulary, or a variety of other strategies for determining whether a XAML member is writable in your XAML vocabulary. ## 构造没有 XAML 架构上下文的 XamlMemberConstructing XamlMember Without XAML Schema Context 大多数构造函数都需要作为其初始化的一部分。Most constructors of require a as part of their initialization. 许多内部操作 (例如, 获取从支持类型转发的信息) 也需要。The is also necessary for many internal operations, such as obtaining information that is being forwarded from the backing type. 使用 API 时, 通常具有可从周围构造 (如) 获取的。 When you are working with the API, you typically have a that is available from a surrounding construct such as a . 在这种情况下, 可以将引用传递到需要 xaml 架构上下文的所有 XAML 类型系统调用。In this case, you can pass the reference through to all XAML type system calls that require a XAML schema context. 一个特定构造函数不需要。One specific constructor, , does not require a . 但是, 使用签名构造的将为返回`true`。 However, a that is constructed with the signature returns `true` for . 对于涉及的加载路径, 此类成员不能写入对象图。For a load path that involves , such a member cannot be written into an object graph. 使用 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现, 当的`true`相关报表时, 调用将引发。 Using the .NET Framework XAML services implementation, the call throws a when the relevant reports `true` for . 您不应构造一个具有值的`true` , 除非您的实现可以处理中的异常, 或者您可以使用其他方法来调整行为。You should not construct a that has a value of `true` for unless your implementation can handle the exceptions from , or you have other ways to adjust the behavior. 例如, 以下一项或多项操作可能适用于你的实现:For example, one or more of the following might be true of your implementation: - XAML 架构上下文稍后会提供。The XAML schema context is available later. - 你使用成员调用程序模式。You use a member invoker pattern. - 您在自定义 XAML 编写器中有意重写。You deliberately override in a custom XAML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值通常是在初始化过程中设置的, `null`通常不是这样。This value is typically set during initialization and is usually not `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 可以通过构造函数传入信息以进行初始化。 information can be passed in by constructors for initialization. 通过将直接调用到基构造函数中 , 派生类的初始化可能会忽略在基类中进行的一些值检查。By calling directly into base constructors, initialization for derived classes can omit some of the value-checks that are made in the base class. 因此, 派生的初始化可更改 XAML 成员的已报告类型成员关系信息, 使其不再按预期方式与其基础 CLR 声明的类型系统信息对齐。Therefore, the derived initialization can change the reported type-member relationship information of a XAML member so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type system information of its underlying CLR declaration. 对于声明类型信息的任何安全关键检查, 请改用基础 CLR 类型。For any security-critical checks of declaring type information, use the underlying CLR type instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法的调用或特定的重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 在初始内部反射逻辑尚未设置信息的情况下, 会发生此行为。This behavior occurs in cases where the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 此`DependsOn`模式可应用于特意矛盾一般 XAML 规则的对象模型事例。The `DependsOn` pattern can be applied to object model cases that deliberately contradict a general XAML rule. 一般的 XAML 规则是, 不能作为初始化文本传递的类型成员 (或通过 XAML 2009 中的工厂方法传递的成员) 必须能够以任意顺序分配。The general XAML rule is that members of a type that are not passed as initialization text (or by a factory method in XAML 2009) must be able to be assigned in any order. 通过向成员`DependsOn`应用模式, 可以指示 XAML 编写器始终处理此成员之前的引用成员。By applying a `DependsOn` pattern to a member, you can instruct XAML writers to always process the referenced member before this member. 您可以在以下情况下应用此模式: 当前成员的值需要上下文或其他仅在设置其他成员后才可用的信息。You can apply this pattern in situations where the value of the current member requires context or other information that is only available after the other member is set. 应`DependsOn`慎用此模式, 为其提供结构化用途的属性方案保留。The `DependsOn` pattern should be applied judiciously and reserved for property scenarios where it serves an architectural purpose. 大量依赖项可能会减慢 XAML 处理的速度。Large numbers of dependencies have the potential to slow down XAML processing. 此外, 还可以生成循环依赖项, 在这种情况下, XAML 处理行为是不确定的。Also, it is possible to produce circular dependencies, in which case the XAML processing behavior is undefined. WPF `DependsOn`中的示例方案包括、 、 和上的特定属性。Example `DependsOn` scenarios from WPF include certain properties on and , on , and on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现使用以下逻辑和处理顺序:The default implementation uses the following logic and processing order: - 如果在成员级别 () 存在特性化, 则使用特性信息针对 XAML 架构上下文调用。If attributing exists at the member level (), the attribute information is used for a call to against the XAML schema context. - 如果有效, 则返回与该类型相关联的值转换器。If is valid, a value converter that is associated with the type is returned. - 如果前面的条件不适用, `null`则返回。If the previous conditions do not apply, `null` is returned. 当调用方从获取值时, 将调用此方法。This method is invoked when a caller gets a value from . 如果您想要报告整个派生类的统一结果, 或者您有可用于根据每个案例来确定这一点的专用元数据, 请重写此方法。Override this method if you want to report uniform results for an entire derived class, or if you have specialized metadata available to determine this on a per-case basis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法的调用或特定的重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 初始内部反射逻辑尚未设置信息时, 会发生这种情况。This occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 在默认行为 (不重写) 中, 返回的概念含义可能不同。In the default behavior (no override), the returned can have different conceptual meanings. 适用的含义取决于它是表示属性、方法还是事件, 如以下列表所示:Which meaning applies depends on whether this represents a property, method, or event, as the following list shows: - 对于属性, 返回的是设置属性或由属性返回的类型。For a property, the returned is the type that sets the property or is returned by the property. - 对于事件, 返回的是必需的事件处理程序类型 (CLR 实现中的委托)。For an event, the returned is the required event handler type (a delegate in a CLR implementation). - 对于方法, 是该方法的返回类型, 它可以是`null`。For a method, is the return type of that method, which may be `null`. 在每种情况下, XAML 架构上下文用于计算来自后备类型的 XAML 类型。In each case, the XAML schema context is used to evaluate the XAML type from the backing type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法的调用或特定的重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 当初始内部反射逻辑尚未设置此信息时, 会出现此行为。This behavior occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 为返回非 null 属性值的实现并不一定是有效的。Implementations that return a non-null property value for are not necessarily a working . 下面是的可能非 null 返回值的列表, 这些值表示的值是什么:The following is a list of possible non-null return values for and what these values represent: - 返回值将报告特定于该成员或更一般为转换器的目标类型的类型转换器。The return value reports a type converter that is attributed specifically to that member or more generally to the target type of the converter. 此行为通常是大多数 XAML 类型系统和 XAML 处理器的外观, 以便实例化类型转换器并调用其方法。This behavior is typically what most XAML type systems and XAML processors look for in order to instantiate a type converter and invoke its methods. - 返回值报告内置值转换器。The return value reports a built-in value converter. 这些转换器适用于 XAML 编写器执行的某些内部操作。These converters exist for certain internal operations that are performed by a XAML writer. 特别是, 这些内置值转换器将原始属性字符串值转换为 XAML 语言级基元。In particular, these built-in value converters convert the raw attribute string values to the XAML language-level primitives. 对于 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现, 这些内置类型转换通常转发到系统程序集中定义的类型转换器。For the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, these built-in type conversions often forward to a type converter that is defined in the System assembly. 例如, 值的转换具有内置的正向转换, 因此值引用。For example, a conversion for an value has built-in forwarded conversion, and therefore, the value references . - 返回值报告不受约束的对象模型的特殊情况;也就是说, 的 值为。The return value reports the special case of an unconstrained object model; that is, the has a value of . 在这种情况下 , 将报告为 {`Object}`。In this case, the reports that the is {`Object}`. 但是, `null`因为没有可用于执行此转换的实际类型或实例。However, is `null` because no actual type or instance is available to perform this conversion. 相反, 在运行时, 当特定技术的运行时确定其对象图的处理时, 不能确定对象模型的行为。Instead, the object model behavior cannot be determined until run time, when the runtime of the specific technology determines the handling of its object graph. 如果可以从 访问工作, 则可以调用其转换方法。If you can access a working from , you can invoke its conversion methods. 但是, 许多转换方法依赖于服务上下文。However, many conversion methods rely on service context. 如果你没有可用的相同服务上下文, 并且类型转换器需要其为对象图写入对象的典型角色, 则转换器方法可能会引发异常。If you do not have the same service context available that the type converter expects for its typical role of writing objects for object graphs, the converter methods can throw exceptions.
